name: Ton Launchpad
description: The TON Launchpad Ascend Tiers system is designed to reward participants for their commitment to the platform. By staking TON tokens, investors unlock progressively better opportunities for participating in token sales, community governance, and exclusive access to investment opportunities. Whether you're just starting out or are an experienced investor, the Ascend Tiers offer tailored benefits to suit your level of engagement. The three tiers—Aqua, Sky, and Sapphire—provide access to different levels of token sale allocations, staking rewards, and governance power. As you ascend through the tiers, your level of influence and the benefits you receive grow accordingly. Each tier is crafted to ensure that investors, no matter their stake size, can participate in and benefit from the vibrant TON ecosystem. Let’s dive into what each tier has to offer.
